= Git User's Survey 2008 summary =

<b>The Git User's Survey 2008 has begun.</b>

[http://www.survs.com/survey?id=M3PIVU72&channel=2WXE4BVTW8 Git User's Survey] is up now!. Please devote a few minutes of your time to fill this simple questionnaire, it will help a lot the Git community to understand your needs, what you like of Git, and of course what you don't like of it.

This survey would last from September 1 to October 10, 2008.

Have fun!
